name: Through Blood And Flesh
description:
This game was made for the Procjam and the 7DFPS jam.

You are trapped with an strange, constantly growing mass!

Defend yourself with your gun, get money by destroying the mass and buy better weapons with it.

Your weapon is randomly generated, so if you get a bad one, maybe more luck next time? :D

How long can you survive? Can you get the best Highscore?

(Feel free to write your highscore down in the comments)
